paper.title: Alternative measures of systems effectiveness: associations and implications
paper.publisher: Society for Information Management and The Management Information Systems Research Center
paper.abstract: This article reports results from a study that examined the implementation of computerized modeling systems in 29 organizations. The focus is on the use of various MIS effectiveness measures that are reported in MIS research.
